content: Hi I'm Sriharsh Amur, participating in GCI. The QT tasks sound really interesting as I have never made a QT or in fact any Graphical Project in C++. So really Excited. Let's see what I can do in these 30 Days!!!
HI Sriharsh! I'm also participating in GCI! You can join #Google Code-in to ask task-related questions and other GCI-related updates. :)
